headline: Ackman bets on Nike, Amazon health, FuelCell cuts costs: Market Minute
summary: Billionaire hedge fund manager Bill Ackman increased his bets by fivefold in Nike (NKE), suggesting potential changes to unlock shareholder value. Amazon's (AMZN) One Medical launches low-cost health services, starting at $10. Prime members can access a variety of health and lifestyle services, putting pressure on competitors like Hims & Hers (HIMS). FuelCell Energy (FCEL) announced plans to cut operating costs by 15% in 2025, including a 17% workforce reduction, while focusing on AI-driven growth in data center energy demand. Yahoo Finance’s Rachelle Akuffo joins Wealth to break down the trending headlines in the video above. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Cindy Mizaku.
